SELECT s.store_code ,s.store_name ,s.store_addr ,s.store_tel ,m.member_name ,m.member_tel ,s.store_reg_date FROM tb_store AS s JOIN tb_member AS m on s.member_id = m.member_id ORDER by m.member_name ,m.member_tel;
